settings.title: Description
settings.answer:
The sun dips low, gilding the lush garden in golden light. A warm breeze, perfumed by nature, carries whispers of citrus and jasmine through the air. Beneath the shelter of an ancient pergola, a secret garden awaits – a sanctuary where nature blooms with irreverent beauty. It’s the perfect spot for a first date.

The air is awakened by a scent, a fragrance that unfolds like a melody. A succulent burst of sweet Bergamot and Lemon, tempered by the juiciness of sun-ripened fruits, sets the tone. Jasmine, delicate yet assertive, threads through this citrus medley, creating an olfactory dance in the breeze, as if this perfect moment had been bottled. Golden hour invites us closer, a moment suspended in light and anticipation.

As the first stars puncture the evening sky, the fragrance deepens, and sweet, woody Amber unfolds. They create a warmth that feels like an embrace – intimate, inviting, timeless. A scent alive with possibilities, it captures the essence of a perfect first date. A suspended reality where nothing matters but the instinctual pull, primal yet refined. A moment where love dares to bloom, unbound.

settings.title: Shipping & Return
settings.answer: Orders within the UAE will be delivered in approximately 1-2 business days, while international orders may take around 10-14 business days to arrive.

settings.title: Additional Info
settings.answer:
Notes:

T: Citrus, Passion Fruit

H: Flower Petals

B: Amber

settings.title: Free shipping
settings.content: Free worldwide shipping and returns - customs and duties taxes included

settings.title: Customer service
settings.content: We are available from monday to friday to answer your questions.

settings.title: Contact us
settings.content: Need to contact us? Just send us an e-mail at sales@amaya-international.com.

settings.title: about the product
settings.content:
The First Glance
Bergamot & Lemon—bright, sweet, irresistibly fresh.
———————————————
A Dance in the Breeze
Jasmine & Sun-kissed Fruits—delicate, radiant, alive.
———————————————
Golden Hour Lingers
Amber & Woods—warm, intimate, timeless.
———————————————
A Scent Like a First Date
Unscripted. Unfiltered. Thrillingly uncertain.
———————————————
Light Fades, Chemistry Grows
For those who follow the pull of the moment.
———————————————
More Than a Fragrance. A Spark.
Where love dares to bloom.
———————————————

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: Rule-Breaking Perfumes
settings.content: Designed for those who refuse the ordinary.

settings.title: Evolves With You
settings.content: Layers of scent revealing new sides of you.

settings.title: More Than a Scent
settings.content: A bold statement of freedom and self-discovery.
